title: Open SDG site configuration
description: This form will produce the site configuration for your Open SDG implementation.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: If these settings are used, usage statistics will be sent to Google Analytics. These are optional, and you don't have to use all of them. Typically you would just use one, such as the 'ua' option.

ua.title: Universal Analytics (ua) tracking ID
ua.description: The tracking ID for the analytics.js approach, for your property on Google Analytics. Typically starts with 'UA-'.

gtag.title: gtag.js (gtag) tracking ID
gtag.description: The tracking ID for the gtag.js approach, for your property on Google Analytics. Typically starts with 'G-'.

gtm.title: Google Tag Manager (gtm) tracking ID
gtm.description: Your tracking ID for Google Tag Manager. Typically starts with 'GTM-'. Though this is included as an analytics approach, it requires additional configuration within Google Tag Manager in order to capture analytics.

links.rel: More information on the analytics setting

breadcrumbs.title: Breadcrumbs
breadcrumbs.description: This can contain breadcrumb settings for each of the supported collection types: goal, indicator, and post. Each should have a list of label/path objects.

goal.title: Goal breadcrumbs
goal.description: The breadcrumb items for goal pages.

indicator.title: Indicator breadcrumbs
indicator.description: The breadcrumb items for indicator pages. Note that there will automatically be a final item, which is a link to the goal that the indicator belongs to. You do not need to specify this, since it is done dynamically and automatically.

post.title: Post breadcrumbs
post.description: The breadcrumb items for post pages.

links.rel: More information on the breadcrumbs setting

cookie_consent_form.title: Cookie consent form
cookie_consent_form.description: A cookie consent form for users

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether the cookie consent form will be enabled

links.rel: More information on the cookie_consent_form setting

country.title: Country information
country.description: Information about your country (or region, locality, etc.)

links.rel: More information on the country setting

create_goals.title: Create goals
create_goals.description: This setting can be used to automatically create the goal pages.

previous_next_links.title: Previous/next links
previous_next_links.description: This setting can be used to show navigation links to the previous/next goals.

goal_content_heading.title: Goal content heading
goal_content_heading.description: Text entered here will appear as an H2 heading above any content configured below in 'goals'.

goals.title: Content per goal
goals.description: This setting can be used to enter details for each goal.

heading.title: Page heading
heading.description: Optional heading to display in the goal banner (as an H1) for this goal. If left blank, the goal name will be used.

content.title: Content
content.description: Markdown content or a translation key for this goal.

content_heading.title: Content heading
content_heading.description: Optional heading to display above the content (as an H2) for this goal. If left blank, the site-wide 'Goal content heading' (above) will be used.

goal.title: Goal
goal.description: Optionally specify the goal ID this content applies to. Can be left blank if using the correct order of the goals (1, 2, 3, etc.).

links.rel: More information on the create goals setting

create_indicators.title: Create indicators
create_indicators.description: This setting can be used to automatically create the indicator pages.

previous_next_links.title: Previous/next links
previous_next_links.description: This setting can be used to show navigation links to the previous/next indicators.

links.rel: More information on the create indicators setting

create_pages.title: Create pages
create_pages.description: This setting can be used to automatically create the pages.

filename.title: Filename
filename.description: The filename for the page - usually 'index.html'.

folder.title: Folder
folder.description: The folder path for the page.

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: The layout to use for the page.

title.title: Title
title.description: The page title for the page.

links.rel: More information on the create pages setting

custom_css.title: Custom CSS files
custom_css.description: Deprecated: instead of using this, it is recommended to put custom CSS in a _sass/custom.scss file.

links.rel: More information on the custom CSS setting

custom_js.title: Custom JavaScript files
custom_js.description: This setting can be used to load additional JavaScript files on each page.

links.rel: More information on the custom JS setting

data_edit_url.title: Data edit URL
data_edit_url.description: This setting controls the URL of the 'Edit Data' buttons that appear on the staging site's indicator pages.

links.rel: More information on the data edit URL setting

data_fields.title: Data fields
data_fields.description: Control the names of fields used for special purposes in data.

units.title: Units
units.description: Field to reserve for units of measurement. Defaults to 'Units'.

series.title: Series
series.description: Field to reserve for the SDG series. Defaults to 'Series'.

links.rel: More information on the data fields setting

date_formats.title: Date formats
date_formats.description: This setting can be used to control date formats for use in the site, such as in the news/category/post layouts. Any number date formats can be entered, and each must have an arbitrary type, such as `standard`. Make sure that each type has a variant for each of your languages.

language.title: Language
language.description: Language code the format applies to.

links.rel: More information on the date formats setting

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: This setting controls the content of the disclaimer that appears at the top of each page.

phase.title: Phase
phase.description: The development phase of your platform (alpha, beta, etc.)

links.rel: More information on the disclaimer setting

email_contacts.title: Email addresses
email_contacts.description: Email addresses to publish on your platform.

questions.title: Questions
questions.description: Inbox for questions about your platform.

suggestions.title: Suggestions
suggestions.description: Inbox for suggestions for your platform.

functional.title: Functional
functional.description: Inbox for bug reports for your platform.

links.rel: More information on the email contacts setting

empty_metadata_placeholder.title: Empty metadata placeholder
empty_metadata_placeholder.description: This setting controls the text that will display for any metadata field which has no content. Note that this is not used if 'hide_empty_metadata' is true.

links.rel: More information on the empty metadata placeholder setting

empty_metadata_placeholder_sources.title: Empty metadata placeholder (sources)
empty_metadata_placeholder_sources.description: This setting controls the text that will display for any sources field which has no content. Note that this is not used if 'hide_empty_metadata' is true.

links.rel: More information on the empty metadata placeholder (sources) setting

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: Which environment (staging or production) this configuration is for.

links.rel: More information on the environment setting

footer_language_toggle.title: Footer language toggle
footer_language_toggle.description: This setting controls the type of language toggle to be used in the footer.

links.rel: More information on the footer language toggle setting

footer_menu.title: Footer menu
footer_menu.description: The links to display in the footer menu.

links.rel: More information on the footer menu setting

frontpage_cards.title: Frontpage cards
frontpage_cards.description: This setting is only used in the frontpage-alt layout. It can display any number of 'cards' in 3-column rows, beneath the grid of goal tiles.

include.title: Include file
include.description: A Jekyll include file to place inside the card.

button_label.title: Button label
button_label.description: A label for a button to display at the bottom of the card.

button_link.title: Button link
button_link.description: A path or URL for the card's button to link to.

rule_color.title: Rule color
rule_color.description: The color of the horizontal line appearing above the card.

links.rel: More information on the frontpage cards setting

frontpage_goals_grid.title: Frontpage goals grid
frontpage_goals_grid.description: This setting is only used in the frontpage-alt layout. It can display a title and description above the grid of goal tiles.

links.rel: More information on the frontpage goals grid setting

frontpage_introduction_banner.title: Frontpage introduction banner
frontpage_introduction_banner.description: This setting is only used in the frontpage-alt layout. It can display a title and description in a banner at the top of the frontpage.

links.rel: More information on the frontpage introduction banner setting

goal_image_base.title: Goal image base URL
goal_image_base.description: This setting controls the base URL for downloading the imagery for the goals.

links.rel: More information on the goal image base setting

goal_image_extension.title: Goal image extension
goal_image_extension.description: This setting controls the type of file (the file extension) that will be used for the goal images.

links.rel: More information on the goal image extension setting

goals_page.title: Goals page
goals_page.description: This setting is used in the 'goals' layout. It can display a title and description above the grid of goal tiles.

links.rel: More information on the goals page setting

graph_color_headline.title: Graph color for headline
graph_color_headline.description: This setting can be used to customize the color used in the chart 'headlines'.

links.rel: More information on the graph color headline setting

graph_color_headline_high_contrast.title: Graph color for headline - high-contrast
graph_color_headline_high_contrast.description: This setting can be used to customize the color used in the chart 'headlines' in high-contrast mode.

links.rel: More information on the graph color headline high-contrast setting

graph_color_set.title: Graph color set
graph_color_set.description: This setting can be used to customize the color set used in the charts.

links.rel: More information on the graph color set setting

graph_color_list.title: Graph color list
graph_color_list.description: This setting can be used to define a set of colors to be used in the charts. This is only used when graph_color_set is 'custom'.

links.rel: More information on the graph color list setting

graph_color_number.title: Graph color number
graph_color_number.description: This setting can be used to limit the length of the list of colors selected via graph_color_set.

links.rel: More information on the graph color number setting

graph_title_from_series.title: Graph title from series
graph_title_from_series.description: This setting can be set to `true` to use the selected series for the graph title, whenever possible.

links.rel: More information on the graph title from series setting

header_language_toggle.title: Header language toggle
header_language_toggle.description: This setting controls the type of language toggle to be used in the header.

links.rel: More information on the header language toggle setting

hide_empty_metadata.title: Hide empty metadata
hide_empty_metadata.description: This setting can be used to hide any metadata fields that are empty.

links.rel: More information on the hide empty metadata setting

hide_single_series.title: Hide single series
hide_single_series.description: This setting can be used to hide the 'Series' toggle on indicators where there is only one choice.

links.rel: More information on the hide single series setting

hide_single_unit.title: Hide single unit
hide_single_unit.description: This setting can be used to hide the 'Unit' toggle on indicators where there is only one choice.

links.rel: More information on the hide single unit setting

ignored_disaggregations.title: Ignored disaggregations
ignored_disaggregations.description: An optional list of data columns that should not appear as disaggregation drop-downs in the left sidebar.

links.rel: More information on the ignored_disaggregations setting

indicator_config_form.title: Indicator configuration form
indicator_config_form.description: Configuration of the indicator configuration form.

indicator_data_form.title: Indicator data form
indicator_data_form.description: Configuration of the indicator data form.

enabled.title: Enable this type of form
enabled.description: If enabled, the indicator data form will be available.

repository_link.title: Repository link
repository_link.description: The URL pattern of the 'Go to repository' link on the configuration page.

indicator_metadata_form.title: Indicator metadata form
indicator_metadata_form.description: Configuration of the indicator metadata form.

language.title: Language for editing
language.description: Choose the language you prefer when editing metadata. This is used to translate the labels of the metadata fields.

scopes.title: Metadata scopes
scopes.description: Specify the 'scopes' of metadata to include on the form. Eg: 'national' or 'global'.

exclude_fields.title: Exclude fields
exclude_fields.description: Specify any fields you would like to exclude from the form.

translated.title: Display translated contents in the form
translated.description: This should only be enabled if you are using the 'subfolder' approach for your metadata.

indicator_tabs.title: Indicator tabs
indicator_tabs.description: Assign content for the indicator tabs.

tab_1.title: Tab 1
tab_1.description: What to display in the first tab

tab_2.title: Tab 2
tab_2.description: What to display in the second tab

tab_3.title: Tab 3
tab_3.description: What to display in the third tab

tab_4.title: Tab 4
tab_4.description: What to display in the fourth tab

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: This setting controls the languages to be used on the site.

links.rel: More information on the languages setting

languages_public.title: Language code overrides
languages_public.description: This setting can be used if you are not happy with any of the standard language codes.

language.title: Language
language.description: The (standard) language code that you would like to override.

language_public.title: Language override
language_public.description: The (non-standard) language code that you would like show the public instead.

links.rel: More information on the language override setting

logos.title: Logos
logos.description: This setting can be used to control the main logo (or logos).

language.title: Language
language.description: The language on which this logo displays. Leave blank to show on all.

src.title: Image file
src.description: The image file (path or URL) for this logo

alt.title: Alt text
alt.description: The alt text for this logo

links.rel: More information on the logos setting

map_layers.title: Map layers
map_layers.description: Configure any number of layers to display on all indicator maps. A minimum of one layer is required to display maps.

subfolder.title: Subfolder
subfolder.description: The subfolder under 'geojson' in the data repository holding the GeoJSON file for this layer.

label.title: Download button label
label.description: The label to use in the 'Download GeoJSON' button for this layer.

min_zoom.title: Minimum zoom
min_zoom.description: This layer will only be visible when the map is zoomed to at least this number.

max_zoom.title: Maximum zoom
max_zoom.description: The layer will not be visible when the map is zoomed beyond this number.

staticBorders.title: Static borders
staticBorders.description: Whether the borders on this layer should remain visible when the map is zoomed past the maximum.

links.rel: More information on the map layers setting

map_options.title: Map options
map_options.description: Site-wide configuration of map behavior and style.

disaggregation_controls.title: Disaggregation controls
disaggregation_controls.description: Whether the map should provide a button and form for changing the displayed disaggregation.

minZoom.title: Minimum zoom
minZoom.description: The lowest amount of 'zoom' possible for users.

maxZoom.title: Maximum zoom
maxZoom.description: The highest amount of 'zoom' possible for users.

tileURL.title: Tile URL
tileURL.description: If you would like the maps to show tile imagery, add the URL here.

tileOptions.title: Tile options
tileOptions.description: Additional options for map tile imagery.

colorRange.title: Color range
colorRange.description: The color range for the choropleth map.

links.ref: More information on the color range setting

noValueColor.title: No-value color
noValueColor.description: Color for boundaries that have no data.

styleNormal.title: Style (normal)
styleNormal.description: Style for boundaries in normal state

styleHighlighted.title: Style (highlighted)
styleHighlighted.description: Style for boundaries in highlighted state

styleStatic.title: Style (static)
styleStatic.description: Style for boundaries in static state (map layers using the 'static boundaries' option).

links.rel: More information on the map options setting

menu.title: Main menu
menu.description: The links to display in the main menu.

dropdown.title: Dropdown menu
dropdown.description: Enter menu items here to turn this into a dropdown.

links.rel: More information on the menu setting

metadata_edit_url.title: Metadata edit URL
metadata_edit_url.description: This setting controls the URL of the 'Edit Metadata' buttons that appear on the staging site's indicator pages.

links.rel: More information on the metadata edit URL setting

metadata_tabs.title: Metadata tabs
metadata_tabs.description: This setting can control the metadata tabs which appear on the indicator pages.

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: This tab will contain fields in the specific `scope` in your data repository's metadata schema file (eg, `_prose.yml`).

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the metadata tab.

description.title: Description
description.description: A descriptive blurb to show at the top of the tab content.

links.rel: More information on the metadata tabs setting

meta_tags.title: Meta tags
meta_tags.description: This setting can be used to add custom meta tags at any paths.

path.title: Path
path.description: The path within the platform at which to place this tag.

name.title: Name
name.description: The 'name' attribute for the meta tag.

src.title: Content
src.description: The 'content' attribute for the meta tag. Translation keys can be used.

links.rel: More information on the Meta Tags setting

news.title: News
news.description: Configuration related to news updates and posts.

category_links.title: Category links
category_links.description: Whether you would like the 'categories' of posts to generate links to dedicated category pages.

links.rel: More information on the news setting

progress_status.title: Progress status
progress_status.description: This setting is used in the 'goal-with-progress' layout. It controls the behavior of progress status functionality.

status_heading.title: Status heading
status_heading.description: A heading to display before the progress status on indicator pages.

status_help.title: Status help
status_help.description: An explanatory column header above the progress status on goal pages.

status_types.title: Status types
status_types.description: Controls the behavior and labels for the different progress status types.

value.title: Value
value.description: The value of the status type, as it is set in the indicator configuration (eg, 'targetachieved').

label.title: Label
label.description: The human-readable label for the status type. Can be a translation key (eg, 'status.target_achieved').

image.title: Image
image.description: The internal path to the image to use (if any) for this progress status.

alt.title: Alt
alt.description: An alt tag for the image above.

links.rel: More information on the progress status setting

remote_data_prefix.title: Remote data prefix
remote_data_prefix.description: Specify the URL of the 'data service' that is generated from your data repository.

links.rel: More information on the remote data prefix setting

reporting_status.title: Reporting status
reporting_status.description: This setting is used in the 'reportingstatus' layout. It can display a title and description above the reporting status page.

disaggregation_tabs.title: Disaggregation tabs
disaggregation_tabs.description: Whether or not to display disaggregation status tabs. If you enable this setting, you should also use 'expected_disaggregations' in your indicator configuration, in order to provide the disaggregation status report with useful metrics.

status_types.title: Status types
status_types.description: Controls the behavior and labels for the different reporting status types.

value.title: Value
value.description: The value of the status type, as it is set in the indicator configuration (eg, 'complete').

label.title: Label
label.description: The human-readable label for the status type. Can be a translation key (eg, 'status.reported_online').

hide_on_goal_pages.title: Hide on goal pages
hide_on_goal_pages.description: Whether to hide this status type on goal pages. Useful for the most commonly-occuring type.

links.rel: More information on the reporting status setting

repository_url_data.title: Repository URL - Data
repository_url_data.description: The URL of your data repository, eg: https://github.com/my-github-org/data

links.rel: More information on the data repository URL setting

repository_url_site.title: Repository URL - Site
repository_url_site.description: The URL of your site repository, eg: https://github.com/my-github-org/site

links.rel: More information on the site repository URL setting

search_index_boost.title: Search index boost
search_index_boost.description: This setting can be used to give a boost to one or more fields in the search index.

boost.title: Boost
boost.description: Higher boost means higher search ranking.

links.rel: More information on the search index boost setting

search_index_extra_fields.title: Search index extra fields
search_index_extra_fields.description: This setting can be used to index additional metadata fields in your indicators, for the purposes of affecting the site-wide search.

links.rel: More information on the search index extra fields setting

site_config_form.title: Site configuration form
site_config_form.description: Configuration of the site configuration form.

time_series_attributes.title: Time-series attributes
time_series_attributes.description: This setting can be used to specify data columns to be considered 'time-series attributes' and displayed in the footer.

label.title: Label
label.description: Label when displayed in the footer.

links.rel: More information on the time series attributes setting

validate_indicator_config.title: Validate indicator config
validate_indicator_config.description: If checked, this will require that all indicators have valid Open SDG indicator configuration.

links.rel: More information on the validate indicator config setting

validate_site_config.title: Validate site config
validate_site_config.description: If checked, this will require valid site configuration.

links.rel: More information on the validate site config setting

x_axis_label.title: X axis label
x_axis_label.description: A label beneath the X axis on charts. This is overridden by the same indicator configuration setting.

links.rel: More information on the X axis label setting

path.title: Path
path.description: Path or URL that the menu item should link to.

translation_key.title: Label
translation_key.description: Label (or translation key) for the link.

path.title: Path
path.description: Path or URL that the breadcrumb item should link to.

label.title: Label
label.description: Label (or translation key) for the breadcrumb item.

opacity.title: Opacity
opacity.description: The opacity of the boundary borders (between 0 and 1).

fillOpacity.title: Fill opacity
fillOpacity.description: The opacity of the boundaries' background color (between 0 and 1).

color.title: Color
color.description: The color of the boundary borders.

dashArray.title: Dash array
dashArray.description: A 'dash array' describing the boundary as dashed lines.

enabled.title: Enable this type of form
enabled.description: If enabled, this type of configuration form will be available.

dropdowns.title: Dropdown lists
dropdowns.description: Set options for any dropdown lists.

jsonschema.title: JSONSchema path
jsonschema.description: The jsonschema path to the dropdown field.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Optional list of dropdown option labels. Should correspond to the values above.

repository_link.title: Repository link
repository_link.description: The URL pattern of the 'Go to repository' link on the configuration page.

translation_link.title: Translation link
translation_link.description: The URL pattern for all 'Go to translation' links on the configuration page.
